data.lyric:
[ti:God's Country]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]God's Country - Blake Shelton
[00:08.75]Lyrics by：Michael Hardy/Jordan Schmidt/Devin Dawson
[00:17.51]Right outside of this one church town
[00:20.58]There's a gold dirt road to a whole lot of nothin'
[00:23.92]Got a deed to the land but it ain't my ground
[00:27.37]This is God's country
[00:31.14]We pray for rain and thank it when it's fallen
[00:34.46]'Cause it brings a grain and a little bit of money
[00:37.64]We put it back in the play
[00:39.39]I guess that's why they call it God's country
[00:44.85]I saw the light in the sunrise
[00:47.95]Sittin' back in the 40 on the muddy riverside
[00:51.31]Gettin' baptized in holy water and shine
[00:54.84]With the dogs runnin'
[00:58.51]Saved by the sound of the been found
[01:01.66]Dixie whistle in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[01:05.06]The devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[01:08.50]This is God's country
[01:12.39]We turned the dirt and worked until the week's done
[01:15.90]We take a break and break bread on Sunday
[01:18.85]And then do it all again
[01:20.59]'Cause we're proud to be from God's country
[01:24.47](Yeah yeah)
[01:26.07]I saw the light in the sunrise
[01:29.04]Sittin' back in the 40 on the muddy riverside
[01:32.47]Gettin' baptized in holy water and shine
[01:35.95]With the dogs runnin'
[01:39.63]Saved by the sound of the been found
[01:42.84]Dixie whistle in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[01:46.27]The devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[01:49.64]This is God's country
[01:53.51](Yeah)
[01:59.50](This is God's country)
[02:03.69]God's country
[02:07.21]I don't care what my headstone reads
[02:10.27]Or what kind of pine wood box I end up in
[02:14.11]When it's my time lay me six feet deep
[02:17.09]In God's country
[02:19.22](Yeah yeah)
[02:20.79]I saw the light in the sunrise
[02:23.94]Sittin' back in the 40 on the muddy riverside
[02:27.37]Gettin' baptized in holy water and shine
[02:30.82]With the dogs runnin'
[02:34.50]Saved by the sound of the been found
[02:37.65]Dixie whistle in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[02:41.11]The devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[02:44.48]This is God's country
[02:47.40](God's country)
[02:48.12]Yeah I saw the light in the sunrise
[02:51.31]Sittin' back in the 40 on the muddy riverside
[02:54.78]Gettin' baptized in holy water and shine
[02:58.24]With the dogs runnin'
[03:01.92]Saved by the sound of the been found
[03:05.09]Dixie whistle in the wind that'll get you Heaven bound
[03:08.54]The devil went down to Georgia but he didn't stick around
[03:11.91]This is God's country
data.trans:
[ti:God's Country]
[ar:Blake Shelton]
[al:God's Country]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:08.75]//
[00:17.51]小镇教堂的外面
[00:20.58]有一条美丽的泥泞小道通向远方
[00:23.92]这块地的地契在我手里 但它并不属于我
[00:27.37]这是上帝的家园
[00:31.14]我们诚心祈雨 下雨后再去还愿
[00:34.46]因为甘霖能够滋养农作物 给我们带来收入
[00:37.64]我们用另一种形式回馈上帝
[00:39.39]我想 正因为如此 我们才把这里叫做上帝的家园
[00:44.85]日出时 我看到了晨曦
[00:47.95]在泥泞的河边 喝着小酒 十分惬意
[00:51.31]接受雨水和阳光的洗礼
[00:54.84]狗狗在追逐嬉戏
[00:58.51]听见有人找到了我 有种得救的感觉
[01:01.66]Dixie站在风中吹着口哨 让你感觉身处天堂
[01:05.06]恶魔经过了佐治亚州 但没有逗留太久
[01:08.50]这是上帝的家园
[01:12.39]我们翻土动工 一直干到周末
[01:15.90]周天我们好好休息了一下 一起聚了餐
[01:18.85]然后又开始新的一周
[01:20.59]我们都来自上帝的家园 我们倍感自豪
[01:24.47]//
[01:26.07]日出时 我看到了晨曦
[01:29.04]在泥泞的河边 喝着小酒 十分惬意
[01:32.47]接受雨水和阳光的洗礼
[01:35.95]狗狗在追逐嬉戏
[01:39.63]听见有人找到了我 有种得救的感觉
[01:42.84]Dixie站在风中吹着口哨 让你感觉身处天堂
[01:46.27]恶魔经过了佐治亚州 但没有逗留太久
[01:49.64]这是上帝的家园
[01:53.51]//
[01:59.50]这是上帝的家园
[02:03.69]上帝的家园
[02:07.21]我不在乎我的墓志铭上写了什么
[02:10.27]也不在乎我的骨灰盒长什么样子
[02:14.11]如果生命已到尽头 就把我埋到地下六英尺深的墓穴里吧
[02:17.09]在上帝的家园里
[02:19.22]//
[02:20.79]日出时 我看到了晨曦
[02:23.94]在泥泞的河边 喝着小酒 十分惬意
[02:27.37]接受雨水和阳光的洗礼
[02:30.82]狗狗在追逐嬉戏
[02:34.50]听见有人找到了我 有种得救的感觉
[02:37.65]Dixie站在风中吹着口哨 让你感觉身处天堂
[02:41.11]恶魔经过了佐治亚州 但没有逗留太久
[02:44.48]这是上帝的家园
[02:47.40]上帝的家园
[02:48.12]日出时 我看到了晨曦
[02:51.31]在泥泞的河边 喝着小酒 十分惬意
[02:54.78]接受雨水和阳光的洗礼
[02:58.24]狗狗在追逐嬉戏
[03:01.92]听见有人找到了我 有种得救的感觉
[03:05.09]Dixie站在风中吹着口哨 让你感觉身处天堂
[03:08.54]恶魔经过了佐治亚州 但没有逗留太久
